channel.title: NPC Kill Counter
channel.description:
hi
can somebody pls make me a kill counter or tell me how to make one i am looking for almost a week now and i cant find it
the idea is simple
just a little counter that counts the amount of npc's you've killed and the counter is in the upperleft side of the playing screen
thanks in advance
kevin

item.title: NPC Kill Counter
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

[quote="-Legend-, post:14, topic:197633"][quote author=JRealm link=topic=262241.msg2171590#msg2171590 date=1207691924]

public class CounterDemo {
private int kc;
CounterDemo() { System.out.println("A Kill Counter class file for Kevin-net2."); }

private void kill(int npc) {
if(npc.applydead) {
kc += 1;
System.out.println("Oh my God! my Kill Counter got Raised! Halp.");
}
}

}

Learn from it. Or visit Java.com
[/quote]

What the fuck. Learn to indent at least and that hole thing is shit. Wow, you have no idea what you’re even talking about, honestly, just stop before continuing. Java.com? This is quite different from: http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/[/quote]
Rofl. I know i have a shit style of English. But ive learned most of Java Tutorials on Java website. And i have my own style
of writing Java codes. Not like X91 Style lol.

Read full topic
